channel.title: CVE Feed for xdan -- Jodit Editor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for xdan -- Jodit Editor

item.title: CVE-2022-23461|2024-08-03T03:43:46.107Z -- xdan -- jodit%20editor
item.description: Jodit Editor is a WYSIWYG editor written in pure TypeScript without the use of additional libraries. Jodit Editor is vulnerable to XSS attacks when pasting specially constructed input. This issue has not been fully patched. There are no known workarounds.
